bug.author: Soptq
bug.description: Execute wandb sync --sync-all error <denchmark-code>Exception in thread Thread-2: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/root/miniconda3/envs/cluster/lib/python3.8/threading.py", line 932, in _bootstrap_inner self.run() File "/root/miniconda3/envs/cluster/lib/python3.8/site-packages/wandb/sync/sync.py", line 138, in run sm.send(pb) File "/root/miniconda3/envs/cluster/lib/python3.8/site-packages/wandb/internal/sender.py", line 90, in send send_handler(record) File "/root/miniconda3/envs/cluster/lib/python3.8/site-packages/wandb/internal/sender.py", line 372, in send_run self._start_run_threads() File "/root/miniconda3/envs/cluster/lib/python3.8/site-packages/wandb/internal/sender.py", line 464, in _start_run_threads email=self._settings.email, AttributeError: 'SettingsStatic' object has no attribute 'email' </denchmark-code>
